description: Colchester boost their League Two play-off hopes and dent Notts County's promotion push with a narrow win at the JobServe Community Stadium.
title: Colchester United 1-0 Notts County
title_page: Colchester United 1-0 Notts County - BBC Sport
maintext:
Colchester United have won just one of their last eight league games against Notts County (D3 L4), a 5-4 victory in this exact fixture last season.
Notts County have won four of their last seven away league games against Colchester United (D1 L2), scoring 2.6 goals per match on average during that time.
Colchester have lost just one of their last seven home league games (W5 D1), though that sole defeat did come last time out on home soil against Grimsby Town (2-1).
Notts County have won both of their last two away league games 2-0, and could win three in succession whilst keeping a clean sheet in each in the EFL for the first time since September 2017.
